maqras.text: 38|21|nonjaenghadeon muliui iyagiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo geudeul-eun gaein-ui gidosil byeog-wilo eullagassdeola

38|22|geudeul-i dawis ap-eulo gass-eul ttaegeuga geudeul-eul dulyeowo hani geudeul-i malhagil dulyeowo masiyo jeohuineun ui gyeon-eul dallihaneun dusalam-eulo nuga jalmoshayeossseubnikka jeohuideul-eul jinlilo sseo pandanhayeo jusidoe bujeonghage ma obsigo olh-eun gillo jeohuileul indoha yeo jusoseo

38|23|ineun jeoui hyeongjelo aheun a hobmaliui yang-eul soyuhago iss-eumyeo jeoegeneun hanmali bakk-en eobs-seubnida geuleonde geuga geugeos-eul naui bohoa lae dulago malhamyeo jeoege geochin mal-eul haessseubnida

38|24|dawis-i malhagil geuga neoege dan hanmali ppun-in neoui yang-eul geuui yangttelo dula yoguhan geos-eun bunmyeonghan jalmos-ila sillo manh-eun dong-eobjadeul-i seolo-ege jalmos hanani igeos-eun mid eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun ideulkwa gatji anhnola geuleona geudeul-eun sosula daoes-eun hananimkkeseo geuleul siheomham-eul-algo junimkke buboghayeo yongseoleul gu hago hoegaehayeo hananimkkelo gwiuihayeossdeola
38|25|geulihayeo hananim-eun geu-il-e daehayeo geuleul yongseohani geuneun hana nim gakkaie ileuleo aleumdaun an sigcheoleul chaj-assdeogla

38|26|dawis-iyeo uliga neoleul jisang ui daelijaloseo dueossgeoneul salamdeul-euljinliwa jeong-uilo pangyeolhala geuligo ne ma-eum-ui yogmang-eul ttaleuji malla geugeosdeul-i neolo hayeogeum hananim-ui gil eseo beos-eonage hamae hananim-ui gil eseo banghwanghaneun jadeul-egeneun gyesanhaneun geunal-eul mang-gaghan iyulo museoun beol-i iss-eulila

38|27|hananim-i haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui manmul-eul changjoham-eun mogjeog-i iss-eossnola geugeos-eun bulsinjadeul-ui geuleusdoen saeng-gag-eulo bulsinhaneun jadeul-egeneunbuljieug-ui beol-i iss-eulila

38|28|hananim-i mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eul jisang-eseo haeag-eul jeo jileun jadeulcheoleom daeuhandan mal-inyo hananim-i saagham-eul meollihaneun jawasaaghan jaleul dong-ilhage dalul su issgessneunyo
38|29|yeogie hananim-i geudaeege gyesihan seongseoga issnani chugbog-eulo chungmanhasa geugeos-eulo geudeul-i malsseum-eulsuggohago geugeos-eulo salamdeul-i gyohun-eul bad-a deul-igoja ham-ila
38|30|hananim-eun dawis-ege adeullo sollomon-eul jueoss-euni geuneun hullyunghan jong-ieossdeola geulihayeo geuneun hananim-egelo gwiui hayeossdeola
38|31|ohuga doeeo geuui ap-eulo maldeul-i natana seo iss-euni anjeongha go dallim-e sinsoghaessdeola
38|32|geuga malhagil sillo naneun nauijunim-eul yeom-wonhaneun geos gat-i geugeos-eul salanghaess-euni taeyang-i bam-ui beil sog eulo sum-eul ttaekkajiyeossdeola
38|33|geuga naegelo igeos-eul gajyeo ola hadeoni baldeulgwa mogdeul-eul naelyeo chigi sijaghadeola
38|34|hananim-eun sollomon-eul siheomhayeoss euni geuui ogjwa-e han sicheleul noh go junim-ui jabileul guhayeossdeola
38|35|geuga malhagil juyeo gwan-yong-eul bepul-eo jusoseo geuligo nae da-eum-e neun oji ani hal wang-gug-eul jusoseo sillo dangsin-eun eunhyeleul bepusineun su yeojaisibnida
38|36|geuhu hananim-eun balam-eulo ha yeogeum geuege sunjongtologhani geuui myeonglyeong-e ttala geuga wonhaneun gos-eulo yusunhage heulleogadeola
38|37|satangwa mogsudeulgwa mul-e deul-eo ganeun jadeuldo geuleohge hadolog haess-eu myeo
38|38|soesaseul-e hamkke mug-yeo issneun geudeuldo geuleohge hadolog haessnani
38|39|igeos-i hananim-ui eunhyela ne ga geugeos-eulo tain-ege buyeohadeun ttoneun nega geugeos-eul bogwanhadeon gyesan-e daehayeo jilmun-eul badji anihalila
38|40|geuleohge hayeo geuneun hananim ga kkai ileumae choehuui ansigcheolo a leumdaun gos-i issdeola
38|41|hananim-ui jong yol-eul sang-gihala geuneun junimkke gang-guhagil satan-i go tong-gwa jaenan-eulo jeoleul goelobhinaida
38|42|ittae malsseum-i iss-eossnola ne bal lo ttaelila yeogie ssis-eul mulgwa masi gie kkaekkushan mul-i iss-eul geos-ila
38|43|hananim-eun geuui gajog-eul beonseongke hasa geuui suleul gobjeollo hayeoss-euni igeos-eun hananim-ui eunhyelo ihaehaneun ideul-eul wihan gyohun-ila

38|44|ne son-e handabal-ui pul-eul gaji la geuligo geugeos-eulo ttaelila geuli hadoe maengseleul kkaetteuliji malla sillo hananim-eun geuga innaeham-eulo chungmanham eul al-assnola sillo geuneun hananimkke gwiuihan hullyunghan jong-ila
38|45|hananim-ui jong abeulahamgwa i saggwa yagob-eul sang-gihala geudeul-eun gang hago siyaleul gajyeossnola
38|46|hananimkkeseo mogjeog-eul dusa geu deul-eul seontaeghayeo naese-ui mesejileul allineunde iss-eossnola
38|47|sillo geudeul-eun seontaegbad-eun hullyung han dongbanjadeullo hananim an-e iss-eoss nola
38|48|iseuma-elgwa ellisyawa julkipeul-eul sang-gihala geudeuldo seon-indeullo seon taegbad-eun ja jung-e iss-eossnola
38|49|igeos-eun hanaui gyohun-ila sil lo uiloun janeun aleumdaun choehuui geojujileul gajil geos-ila
38|50|eden-ui cheongug-i balo geudeul-eul wihae mun-eul yeol-eonohgo issnani
38|51|geudeul-eun geugos-eseo hyusig-eul chwi hamyeo pungseonghan gwailgwa dalkomhan eumlyo suleul cheonghamae
